content:
The provided code chunk imports essential Panda3D modules required for handling physics and collisions, which are used throughout the AvatarControls class implementation. These imports should be situated at the top of the document to ensure all subsequent code can access these classes and functions properly.

Succinct context: The import statements bring in necessary Panda3D modules (e.g., ActorNode, ForceNode) that enable physics simulation and collision handling for the avatar controls functionality.

CollisionTraverser,
    ConfigVariableBool,
    LRotationf,
    Mat3,
    NodePath,
    Point3,
    Vec3,
)
from panda3d.physics import (
    ActorNode,
    ForceNode,
    LinearEulerIntegrator,
    LinearFrictionForce,
    LinearVectorForce,
    PhysicsCollisionHandler,
    PhysicsManager,
)
import math
